body.p: The MITgcm code and documentation are under continuous development. The last official release was called "Release1_patch8" and the current development is stabilizing in anticipation of a "Release2_beta" announcement. Both the last stable release and the current CVS development version can be obtained at:

ul.li:
Release1_patch8 :
View through an HTML-enabled CVS code browser
Download using CVS pserver
Download as a "tar" file.

CVS current :
View through an HTML-enabled CVS code browser
Download using CVS pserver
Download as a "tar" file.
